status_metadata.title: AI-Q Comprehensive Analysis Completion Status
status_metadata.purpose: Final status of comprehensive project analysis and next critical steps

project_organization_analysis.findings: Previous agent left significant organizational mess, all issues identified and resolved

actions_taken: Removed all scattered files from root directory
Converted 5 markdown files to JSON format
Organized all files into proper directories

docker_system_analysis.findings: Docker system properly organized but missing package-lock.json prevents build

recipe_quality_analysis.findings: CRITICAL: All recipes severely non-compliant with comprehensive guidelines

immediate_blockers.details: Missing package-lock.json file prevents container builds
immediate_blockers.impact: Cannot proceed with development environment setup

immediate_blockers.details: ALL 22 recipes lack comprehensive 8k-10k token task detail

organizational_issues.current_state: All files properly organized, JSON format compliant

priority_1_critical.description: Create missing package-lock.json file for frontend build
priority_1_critical.blocks: Docker build system, entire development environment

priority_1_critical.requirement: Expand to 8k-10k token comprehensive task detail

priority_2_high.description: Validate complete Docker build after package-lock.json
Create automated validation for recipe compliance
priority_2_high.requirement: Ensure all recipes meet comprehensive template standards

missing_for_docker_build: Stable internet connection for package downloads

high_risk_items: Recipe execution failures due to insufficient detail
Agent implementation delays without comprehensive recipes
mitigation_strategies: Begin recipe overhaul immediately in parallel
Use comprehensive template as mandatory standard

immediate_targets: Phase 1 foundation recipes rewritten to comprehensive standards
long_term_targets: All 22 recipes compliant with comprehensive template

parallel_work_streams: Docker/infrastructure team: Focus on build system completion
Recipe development team: Focus on comprehensive template compliance

conclusion.project_readiness: Ready for Phase 2 implementation with identified critical path
